org.athrun.android.framework
类 AthrunDevice

java.lang.Object
  org.athrun.android.framework.AthrunDevice

public final class AthrunDevice
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents the device, and contains methods to operate device, such as press a key.

作者：
bingyang.djj

getScreenHeight

public int getScreenHeight()
Return the height of current screen in pixels.

返回：
Height of current screen.

getScreenWidth

public int getScreenWidth()
Return the width of current screen in pixels.

返回：
Width of current screen

pressKeys

public void pressKeys(int... keys)
Press a series of key by codes example:(KEYCODE_DPAD_LEFT, KEYCODE_DPAD_CENTER).

参数：
keys - Keycode.

public android.app.Activity getCurrentActivity()

setScreenOrientation

public void setScreenOrientation(int orientation)
Sets the Orientation (Landscape/Portrait) for the current activity.

参数：
orientation - An orientation constant such as ActivityInfo.SCREEN_ORIENTATION_LANDSCAPE or ActivityInfo.SCREEN_ORIENTATION_PORTRAIT .

getScreenOrientation

public java.lang.String getScreenOrientation()
Get the Orientation (Landscape/Portrait) for the current activity.

返回：
landscape or portrait.

waitForActivity

public boolean waitForActivity(java.lang.String name,
                               int timeout)
Waits for the given Activity.

参数：
name - the name of the Activity to wait for e.g. "MyActivity"
timeout - the amount of time in milliseconds to wait
返回：
true if Activity appears before the timeout and false if it does not

waitForActivity

public boolean waitForActivity(java.lang.String name)
Waits for the given Activity.

参数：
name - the name of the Activity to wait for e.g. "MyActivity"
返回：
true if Activity appears before the timeout and false if it does not

goBackToActivity

public void goBackToActivity(java.lang.String name)
Returns to the given Activity.

参数：
name - the name of the Activity to return to, e.g. "MyActivity"

isEmulator

public boolean isEmulator()
Return true if current device is an emulator, false otherwise. In order to use this API, your APP but not your test project must has the permission to READ_PHONE_STATE.

返回：
If current device is an emulator, false otherwise.

interruptByCall

public static void interruptByCall(int duration)
Simulate an incoming call and hang up. Only work on emulator now.

In order to use this method, you should run athrun client on PC first.

参数：
duration - How long the call will last.

incomingMessage

public static void incomingMessage()
Simulate an incoming sms. Only work on emulator now.

In order to use this method, you should run athrun client on PC first.

disconnectWifi

public boolean disconnectWifi()
disconnected wifi

参数：
-
返回：
true if succeed
抛出：
java.lang.Exception

reconnected wifi

参数：
-
返回：
true if succeed
抛出：
java.lang.Exception
